description: This file appears to be a C source file implementing the Utopia context management library. It defines structures, enums, macros, static variables, and tables used for managing system configuration, events, static data, and various Utopia values used within a networking or device management project.

methods.name: s_Utopia_AuthFileUpdate
methods.description: Helper function that updates the HTTPD authentication file with username and password from Utopia context.

methods.name: s_UtopiaValue_FormatNamespaceKey
methods.description: Formats namespace and key strings based on Utopia configuration, indexing, and naming conventions, ensuring proper buffer handling and retrieval from Utopia context.

methods.name: s_UtopiaEvent_EnumToIndex
methods.description: Converts a Utopia_Event enum value to an index used in internal tables by calculating its log2 value.

methods.name: s_UtopiaEvent_Get
methods.description: Retrieves event-related data from the Utopia context, initializing event handle if necessary.

methods.name: s_UtopiaEvent_Set
methods.description: Sets a system event key-value pair in the Utopia context, initializing the event handle if needed.

methods.name: s_UtopiaEvent_Wait
methods.description: Waits for a specified system event to change or timeout, handling syscalls and select logic.

methods.name: s_UtopiaEvent_SetNotify
methods.description: Sets notification for a specific sysevent key.

methods.name: s_UtopiaEvent_Trigger
methods.description: Triggers system events based on the context's current event flags, including special handling for reboot and LAN restart.

methods.name: s_UtopiaTransact_Add
methods.description: Adds a new transaction node to the Utopia transaction list with specified namespace, key, and value.

methods.name: s_UtopiaTransact_Find
methods.description: Finds a transaction node matching the provided namespace and key.

methods.name: int UtopiaTransact_Get(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,char * pszNamespace,char * pszKey,char * pszValue,unsigned int ccbBuf)
methods.description: Retrieves a value from either the transaction list or underlying system config, with appropriate locking.

methods.name: int UtopiaTransact_Set(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,char * pszNamespace,char * pszKey,char * pszValue)
methods.description: Sets a value in the transaction list, adding or updating nodes as needed.

methods.name: s_UtopiaTransact_GetAll
methods.description: Retrieves all current configuration and transaction values into a buffer, merging system config and transactional overrides.

methods.name: s_UtopiaTransact_SetAll
methods.description: Unsets or sets all values in the transaction buffer from a string buffer, parsing lines.

methods.name: s_UtopiaValue_GetKey
methods.description: Constructs a key string for configuration or event lookup based on provided parameters and formatting rules.

methods.name: s_UtopiaValue_Get
methods.description: Retrieves a config value using namespace, key, and index formatting, with fallback to the transaction or system config.

methods.name: s_UtopiaValue_Set
methods.description: Sets a configuration or event value, applying necessary formatting and permissions.

methods.name: int Utopia_GetKey(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,char * pszBuffer,unsigned int ccbBuf)
methods.description: Retrieves the key string for config or event based on type.

methods.name: int Utopia_GetIndexedKey(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,int iIndex,char * pszBuffer,unsigned int ccbBuf)
methods.description: Retrieves an indexed key string.

methods.name: int Utopia_GetIndexed2Key(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,int iIndex1,int iIndex2,char * pszBuffer,unsigned int ccbBuf)
methods.description: Retrieves a double-indexed key string.

methods.name: int Utopia_GetNamedKey(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,char * pszName,char * pszBuffer,unsigned int ccbBuf)
methods.description: Retrieves a named key string.

methods.name: int Utopia_GetNamed2Key(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,char * pszName1,char * pszName2,char * pszBuffer,unsigned int ccbBuf)
methods.description: Retrieves a double-named key string.

methods.name: int Utopia_Get(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,char * pszBuffer,unsigned int ccbBuf)
methods.description: Fetches value for a config or event key, trying transaction, static, or fallback to system config.

methods.name: int Utopia_GetAll(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,char * pszBuffer,unsigned int ccbBuf)
methods.description: Retrieves all configuration values into a buffer, integrating transaction and system config data.

methods.name: int Utopia_GetIndexed(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,int iIndex,char * pszBuffer,unsigned int ccbBuf)
methods.description: Fetches value for an indexed configuration.

methods.name: int Utopia_GetIndexed2(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,int iIndex1,int iIndex2,char * pszBuffer,unsigned int ccbBuf)
methods.description: Fetches value for a double-indexed configuration.

methods.name: int Utopia_GetNamed(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,char * pszName,char * pszBuffer,unsigned int ccbBuf)
methods.description: Fetches value for a named configuration.

methods.name: int Utopia_GetNamed2(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,char * pszName1,char * pszName2,char * pszBuffer,unsigned int ccbBuf)
methods.description: Fetches value for a double-named configuration.

methods.name: int Utopia_RawGet(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,char * pszNamespace,char * pszKey,char * pszBuffer,unsigned int ccbBuf)
methods.description: Fetches a raw value without transaction wrapping, directly from system config.

methods.name: int Utopia_RawSet(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,char * pszNamespace,char * pszKey,char * pszValue)
methods.description: Sets a raw value into the system config without transaction context.

methods.name: int Utopia_Set(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,char * pszValue)
methods.description: Sets a value in the transaction list for a configuration or event.

methods.name: int Utopia_SetAll(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,char * pszBuffer)
methods.description: Performs a get-all, unsets all values, and sets new ones from a buffer.

methods.name: int Utopia_SetIndexed(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,int iIndex,char * pszValue)
methods.description: Sets a value for an indexed configuration.

methods.name: int Utopia_SetIndexed2(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,int iIndex1,int iIndex2,char * pszValue)
methods.description: Sets a value for a double indexed configuration.

methods.name: int Utopia_SetNamed(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,char * pszName,char * pszValue)
methods.description: Sets a value for a named configuration.

methods.name: int Utopia_SetNamed2(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,char * pszName1,char * pszName2,char * pszValue)
methods.description: Sets a value for a double-named configuration.

methods.name: int Utopia_Unset(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia)
methods.description: Unsets (removes) a configuration or event value.

methods.name: int Utopia_UnsetIndexed(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,int iIndex)
methods.description: Unsets (removes) an indexed configuration value.

methods.name: int Utopia_UnsetIndexed2(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,int iIndex1,int iIndex2)
methods.description: Unsets (removes) a double indexed configuration value.

methods.name: int Utopia_UnsetNamed(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,char * pszName)
methods.description: Unsets (removes) a named configuration value.

methods.name: int Utopia_UnsetNamed2(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,UtopiaValue ixUtopia,char * pszName1,char * pszName2)
methods.description: Unsets (removes) a double named configuration value.

methods.name: int Utopia_SetEvent(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,Utopia_Event event)
methods.description: Sets a specific event flag in the context.

methods.name: void Utopia_Free(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx,int fCommit)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: int Utopia_Init(UtopiaContext * pUtopiaCtx)
methods.description: unavailable
